body:
**2021 French Open Picks and odds**. Can anyone beat Nadal? How short is he? What about Novak? Plus who wins the always open Womens draw? We plug into the Betfair API to get the exact odds. And show the movement over time so you can see who has been backed in. Plus, we'll share our picks as soon as the draw is announced. - - - ## **ATP Live Ranking For Clay** Before we get into the French Open odds and picks, have a thorough examination of our ATP Rankings on Clay only.
